aka: With the Next Dance, Everything Becomes Different

cast.name: 朱尔·罗斯泰特 Jule Ronstedt

this_title: Beim nächsten Tanz wird alles anders
trans_title: With the Next Dance, Everything Becomes Different
introduction: Dancing teacher Leo (Fritz Karl) knows how to get the salsa-crazy girls dance- and into bed. As he breaks the heart of a talented dancer again, his boss fires him. Now things start to get tight for Leo. At the age of forty it is not really easy to find a job, especially in his profession. The only vacant position he finds is announced for an elderly lady. But Leo does not give up: In a blink, Leo turns into Leonore: he gets the job and soon a new close friend.
foreign_title: Beim nächsten Tanz wird alles anders
